help.title: Help Center
help.description: Everything you need to know to use MemCard at its best
help.discoverSections: Discover the different sections of your application
help.collectionDescription: Your personal collection contains all the games you own. You can organize them by status:
help.allGames: All: All your games, regardless of status
help.inProgress: In Progress: Games you are currently playing
help.backlog: Backlog: Games you haven't started yet
help.platformGenreFilters: Platforms Genres Only show platforms and genres you actually own, with the number of games for each.
help.excelExport: Excel export button in the toolbar
help.wishlistDescription: Your wishlist contains the games you want to acquire. It's a great place to keep track of your gaming wishes.
help.wishlistTip: Tip: You can share your wishlist with your loved ones to make gift buying easier!
help.mobileStatusDisplay: On mobile, game statuses are displayed with icons to save space:
help.searchPageDescription: Use the Search page to find and add games to your collection or wishlist.
help.searchSteps: Click on "Add a game" in the navigation bar Type the game name in the search field Select the platform if you want to filter the results Browse the results and click on the game you are interested in Choose to add it to your Collection or Wishlist Fill in the optional information (purchase price, condition, etc.)
help.sharingDescription: Allow your loved ones to see what you wish for
help.sharingSteps: Go to your Wishlist tab Enable sharing with the Active sharing button Click on the Share button in the top right corner Copy the generated link and share it with your loved ones
help.securityNote: Security note: You can enable or disable sharing at any time. The link only works when sharing is active.
help.friendsDescription: Connect with other collectors and share your discoveries
help.addingFriendsDescription: There are several ways to add friends in MemCard:
help.friendCodeDescription: Each user has a unique code to be added as a friend.
help.friendCodeSteps: Go to your friends page Click on "My friend code" to see your code Share this code with your collector friends They can add you using this code
help.addByCodeDescription: Use a friend's code to add them to your list.
help.addByCodeSteps: Click on "Add a friend" on the friends page Enter your contact's friend code The friend will be automatically added to your list
help.scanQrDescription: Scan a friend's QR code to add them instantly.
help.scanQrSteps: On the friends page, click on the QR code icon Scan the QR code displayed by your friend The friend will be automatically added to your list
help.manageRequestsDescription: Manage incoming and outgoing friend requests.
help.acceptRequestDescription: Click on ‚úì to accept a friend request. You can then see their collection and exchange.
help.refuseRequestDescription: Click on ‚úó to refuse a friend request. The person will not be notified of the refusal.
help.interactDescription: Discover your friends' collections and share your discoveries.
help.shareDiscoveriesDescription: Introduce new games to your friends
help.compareCollectionsDescription: See what you have in common
help.privacyNoteDescription: You can only see collections from people who have accepted you as a friend. Your friends cannot modify your games.
help.publicProfilesDescription: Share your collection and discover others'
help.makeProfilePublicDescription: You can make your profile public to allow other collectors to see your collection.
help.makeProfilePublicSteps: Go to your profile In the "Preferences" section, find the "Public profile" option Check the box to make your profile public Your collection will now be visible to all other collectors
help.profilePublicNote: Note: You can make your profile private at any time by unchecking this option. Only games in your collection (excluding wishlist) will be visible to others.
help.exploreSteps: Click on "Collectors" in the navigation bar You will see the list of all available collectors Use the search bar to find a collector by username Click on a collector to see their complete collection
help.featuresList: View all games in the collection (read-only mode) Filter by status, platform and genre Search within the collection View notes and game ratings
help.importantNoteDescription: You cannot modify or delete other collectors' games. These collections are read-only.
help.giftPurchaseDescription: Manage games that have been gifted to you
help.giftProcess: When someone visits your shared wishlist and checks a game as "Purchased", you receive a notification.
help.receiveNotificationDescription: Click on the üîî icon in the navigation bar to see your gifted game notifications.
help.validatePurchaseDescription: If you have received the game, click on ‚úì. The game will be automatically removed from your wishlist and added to your collection with "To do" status.
help.cancelPurchaseDescription: If the game was not purchased or if it was a mistake, click on ‚úó. The game will remain in your wishlist.
